loggedIn.title: You are already logged in
loggedIn.description: To access this page, you need to log out first.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.description: Enter your credentials to access your account.

signup.title: Create an Account
signup.description: Enter your information to get started.
signup.successDescription: Welcome! We are redirecting you to the dashboard.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password?
forgotPassword.description: No worries, we'll send you reset instructions.
forgotPassword.submittedDescription: If an account with that email exists, we've sent a password reset link.

error.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
error.nameRequired: Name must be at least 2 characters.
error.passwordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters.
error.emailInUse: This email address is already in use.
error.invalidCredentials: The email or password you entered is incorrect.
error.generic: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

hero.subtitle: A single platform to manage sales, inventory, and finances with full control, from anywhere.

socialProof.title: The trust of those who have already transformed their business
socialProof.subtitle: MORE THAN 10,000 BUSINESSES ALREADY USE ENTERPRISY

testimonials.quote1: Before Enterprisy, I wasted hours on spreadsheets. Today, I have full control of my business. It simply changed my game!
testimonials.quote2: I thought ERP was for big companies. Enterprisy is intuitive, affordable, and helped me professionalize my online store. Amazing!
testimonials.quote3: The transition was super smooth. Inventory and order management became much more efficient, and the dashboard gives me the vision I need to make decisions.

painSolution.title: Stop struggling with the mess!
painSolution.subtitle: Enterprisy is the complete solution for your biggest challenges.
painSolution.pain1: Lost a sale due to lack of stock?
painSolution.pain2: Spend hours on financial spreadsheets, unsure of the profit?
painSolution.pain3: Feeling lost with the back and forth of orders?
painSolution.solution1: Real-time updated inventory. Never lose a sale again.
painSolution.solution2: Accurate and automatic reports. Know exactly how much you earn.
painSolution.solution3: Organized orders, updated statuses, and an intuitive workflow.

feature1.title: Uncomplicated Management
feature1.description: Control products, orders, and finances on a single platform. Less bureaucracy, more efficiency.

feature2.title: Intelligent Decisions
feature2.description: Get access to metrics and reports in real-time. Know where to invest to maximize your profit.

feature3.title: Customer Relationship
feature3.description: Organize your contacts and understand purchasing behavior. Build bonds that generate recurring sales.

pricing.title: Choose the ideal plan for your business
pricing.subtitle: Start for free and upgrade when you're ready.

faq.title: Answers to your questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know to make the best decision.
faq.question1: Is Enterprisy suitable for my type of business?
faq.answer1: Yes! Our platform was developed to serve everyone from small entrepreneurs to more robust online stores, with scalable features to accompany your growth.
faq.question2: Is it easy to migrate my data to Enterprisy?
faq.answer2: Our team is ready to help you! We offer a guided migration process so you can bring your products and customers without complications.
faq.question3: How does the trial period work?
faq.answer3: We offer a free plan that you can use for as long as you want. It includes basic features so you can feel the power of Enterprisy without commitment. You only subscribe if you want to evolve.

finalCta.title: Ready to take off?
finalCta.subtitle: Join thousands of entrepreneurs who are transforming their businesses with Enterprisy.

dashboard.recentActivityDesc: An overview of the latest orders in your store.

profilePage.personalInfoDesc: Update your name and email address.

updateSuccess.title: Profile Updated

updateError.title: Update Error
updateError.description: Could not save your information. Please try again.

preferencesPage.title: Preferences
preferencesPage.appearanceDesc: Change the look and feel of the application.

empty.title: No products yet
empty.description: Your products will appear here. Get started by adding your first product.

empty.title: No orders to show
empty.description: When you receive new orders, they will appear here.

generateSuccess.description: The AI has generated a new product description.

generateFailed.title: Generation Failed
generateFailed.description: Could not generate description. Please try again.

error.title: Error Creating Order

checkout.title: Finalize Your Purchase
checkout.subtitle: Complete the details below to start your subscription.

billingPage.title: Subscription Management
billingPage.description: Choose the plan that best suits your needs or manage your current subscription.

authError.title: Authentication Error
authError.description: You must be logged in to subscribe.

success.title: Payment Successful!
success.description: Your subscription has been activated. You can now enjoy all the features of your new plan.

cancelled.title: Payment Cancelled
cancelled.description: The payment process was cancelled. You can try again at any time.

processing.title: Processing...
processing.description: Please wait while we process your subscription information.
